content.query:
-- Read TripType.csv
-- Connect to Built in Serverless SQL Pool
-- Connect to nyc_taxi_discovery Database

USE nyc_taxi_discovery
GO

SELECT *
FROM OPENROWSET(
BULK 'trip_type.tsv' ,
DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw' ,
FORMAT = 'CSV',
PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
FIELDTERMINATOR = '\t',
FIRSTROW = 2,
FIELDQUOTE = '"'
)WITH(
trip_type SMALLINT 1,
trip_type_desc VARCHAR(30) 2

) AS trip
